overview: Redhead is new to the circus. The affair with the clown Bely, impetuous and bright, captivates the girl as much as it frightens. After all, the problems that they encountered in a relationship are painfully reminiscent of those that occur before her eyes in another pair of artists of this circus. Can Redhead make the right choice and learn from the mistakes of others? What awaits her ahead and what deadly number has the circus prepared for her?
title: Parallels
